snippet.title: Goosebumps HorrorTown - Gameplay Trailer for iOS & Android
snippet.description:
Download the game (Free) on the App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/goosebumps-horrortown/id1359182052 or Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pixowl.goosebumps&hl=en - Game Website: http://www.goosebumps.town

R.L. Stine's Goosebumps monsters have come to haunt your phone! 
Follow: https://facebook.com/GoosebumpsHorrorTown/ - 
 http://www.goosebumps.town
Build a town and fill it with the scariest of monsters from the hit horror series. 

Gather a scary assortment of sinister creatures and terrify townsfolk, or play as humans to defend against the monsters!
